Title: A Murder of Crowes
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Fred Golan, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole")
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Raylan goes to Florida to deal with the Crowe family. Meanwhile, Boyd goes to Detroit to find a missing shipment of drugs.
